Class CommandFactory

java.lang.Object
CommandFactory
public class CommandFactory extends Object
Class used to create the commands map, which is later used to call commands

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    private static interface 
    CommandFactory.CommandCreator
    Helping interface used to create a player-requested command, throws special Command exception(helps in debugging)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      command requested, if no problems had been created/the command exists
